Schenectady.Rosendale Common School: Rosendale Common School, also known as Niskayuna Grange Hall No. 1542, is a historic school building located in the vicinity of Niskayuna in Schenectady County, New York. It was built about 1850 and is a ​1 1⁄2-story, three-by-five-bay, timber-frame building on a limestone foundation.
